task.title: Accessing Your Settings
task.shortdesc: Your account settings is where you will be able to verify your card has been updated from temporary to permanent, and check your card's expiry date.

taskbody.prereq: To access your settings, you must be logged in to your library account.

step.note: Accessing the dashboard begins the same way logging in to your account began.
step.cmd: Click on the blue button in the top left corner, which should display your name/username.

image.alt: Image: A screenshot of the blue button, now displaying 'lsoetebier3' a cardholder's username.

stepresult.p: A drop down will appear, just like it did when you were logging in.

image.alt: Image:A screenshot of the account dropdown.

step.cmd: Click the menu item "My Settings", found at the bottom of the drop down.

stepresult.p: You will be brought to the following page:

image.alt: Image: A screenshot of the settings page.

step.note: While on this page you will want to check your information is up to date, and that your card is not expired.
step.cmd: Click display to reveal any of the information that is censored.

info.note: If the barcode does not match the number on your permanent library card, contact your home library for assistance updating your account.
